vignette.name: Collab-Hub Overview
vignette.p: Collab-Hub is a server-based networking tool for sharing control data and events between creative applicationes - built off Node.Js and libraries weâ€™ve written it work with Max, PD, Arduino, Web, JS libraries, and more. These modules are part of the Max client.
Other clients for Collab-Hub can be found at http://www.collab-hub.io.
